translated: The one that is hidden, and the one that is ultimate,

original: slob ma la ni bshad par 'dod //
analyzed: slob ma la ni bshad par 'dod //
translated: Is held to be the one that is taught to the disciples.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: Following the explanatory tantras,

original: bde gshegs rnams kyis gdul bya la //
analyzed: bde gshegs rnams kyis gdul bya la //
translated: The Sugatas, for the sake of those to be tamed,

original: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
translated: In dependence on the two stages,

original: bshad pa'i dbye ba gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: bshad pa'i dbye ba gsungs pa yin //
translated: Have taught the divisions of the explanation.

original: rnam pa kun tu nyan 'dod pa'i //
analyzed: rnam pa kun tu nyan 'dod pa'i //
translated: Those who desire to listen in every way

original: 'jig rten nges par gyur pa ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten nges par gyur pa ni //
translated: Are the definite ones of the world.

original: blo yi rnam pa dpag med las //
analyzed: blo yi rnam pa dpag med las //
translated: From among the immeasurable aspects of mind,

original: gang zag rnam pa lngar 'dod do //
analyzed: gang zag rnam pa lngar 'dod do //
translated: The five types of individuals are asserted.üîΩThe blue lotus, the white lotus,

original: autpala dang pad dkar dang // padma tsandan rin po che //
analyzed: autpala dang pad dkar dang // padma tsandan rin po che //
translated: The lotus, the sandalwood, and the jewel,

original: rang bzhin tha dad ming gis de //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad ming gis de //
translated: Are different by nature, and by name.

original: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin //
translated: All of them are taught by the Omniscient One.

original: de ni ma lus thos gyur la //
analyzed: de ni ma lus thos gyur la //
translated: He hears everything without exception,

original: 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
translated: And is skilled in retaining it.

original: skad cig @3b gis ni brjod 'gyur ba //
analyzed: skad cig @3b gis ni brjod 'gyur ba //
translated: He recites it in an instant,

original: autpala zhes bya'i gang zag go //
analyzed: autpala zhes bya'i gang zag go //
translated: Such is the person called Utpalaka.

original: gzung bya mang du thos gyur kyang //
analyzed: gzung bya mang du thos gyur kyang //
translated: He has heard much and is held in esteem,

original: ston pa yi ni nus med pa //
analyzed: ston pa yi ni nus med pa //
translated: But is incapable of teaching,

original: bum pa'i ras bal sa bon 'dra //
analyzed: bum pa'i ras bal sa bon 'dra //
translated: Like a cotton seed in a pot,

original: pad dkar zhes bya'i gang zag go //
analyzed: pad dkar zhes bya'i gang zag go //
translated: Such is the person called Padmottara.

original: dad dang ldan zhing snying rje shes //
analyzed: dad dang ldan zhing snying rje shes //
translated: He has faith and knows compassion,

original: thos na blo yi kha 'bye la //
analyzed: thos na blo yi kha 'bye la //

original: tshig med 'o ma bzhin 'dzag pa //
analyzed: tshig med 'o ma bzhin 'dzag pa //
translated: But he drips like a cow that has no udder,

original: padma zhes bya'i gang zag go //
analyzed: padma zhes bya'i gang zag go //
translated: Such is the person called Padma.

original: thos pa nyung zhing nga rgyal ldan //
analyzed: thos pa nyung zhing nga rgyal ldan //
translated: He has heard little and is proud,

original: rtsa ba med par mang du smra //
analyzed: rtsa ba med par mang du smra //

original: rjes su gzung bar mi nus pa //
analyzed: rjes su gzung bar mi nus pa //

original: tsandan zhes bya'i gang zag go //
analyzed: tsandan zhes bya'i gang zag go //

original: tshul khrims dag cing mkhas la sgrin //
analyzed: tshul khrims dag cing mkhas la sgrin //

original: shes rab ldan zhing rgyud gcig pa //
analyzed: shes rab ldan zhing rgyud gcig pa //

original: thos nas legs par ston pa ni //
analyzed: thos nas legs par ston pa ni //

original: rin chen zhes bya'i gang zag go //
analyzed: rin chen zhes bya'i gang zag go //

original: autpala de bzhin pad dkar dang // padma tsandan nyid dag ste //
analyzed: autpala de bzhin pad dkar dang // padma tsandan nyid dag ste //
translated: The utpala, the white lotus, the lotus, and the sandalwood.

original: gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni //
analyzed: gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni //
translated: These four persons

original: tshogs pa la bshad gang zag go //
analyzed: tshogs pa la bshad gang zag go //

original: rdzogs pa'i rim gyi skal ldan zhing //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim gyi skal ldan zhing //
translated: The one who is fortunate in the stage of completion

original: rtag tu spyod pas rnam brgyan pa //
analyzed: rtag tu spyod pas rnam brgyan pa //
translated: and is always adorned with conduct,

original: 'di ni rin chen gang zag ste //
analyzed: 'di ni rin chen gang zag ste //

analyzed: slob ma la bshad snod yin no // gang zag zhes pa'i dbye ba yis //
translated: who is a vessel for explaining to the disciple.üîΩHaving thoroughly examined the vessel and the non-vessel

original: snod dang snod min yongs brtags nas //
analyzed: snod dang snod min yongs brtags nas //
translated: through the divisions of the person called the ‚Äúperson,‚Äù

original: rdo rje slob dpon / mkhas pas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon / mkhas pas ni //
translated: the wise vajra master

original: bshad pa rnam pa gnyis bya'o //
analyzed: bshad pa rnam pa gnyis bya'o //
translated: should explain the two kinds of explanations.üîΩHaving ascertained the two truths

original: rgyan ni drug po de rnams kyis //üîΩbden gnyis rnam par nges byas pa //
analyzed: rgyan ni drug po de rnams kyis // bden gnyis rnam par nges byas pa //

analyzed: de ni rgyan gyur bdun pa ste //
translated: that is the seventh ornament,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub pa'o //
translated: the accomplishment of the stage of completion.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: Following the explanatory tantras,

original: bshad smra shin tu rnyed par dka' //
analyzed: bshad smra shin tu rnyed par dka' //
translated: the expounder is very difficult to find.

original: 'di ltar drangs te bshad pa ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar drangs te bshad pa ni //
translated: Thus, the explanation that is drawn forth

analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud las gzhan na min //

original: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //üîΩgleng gzhi rim pa'i sbyor bar bcas //
analyzed: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis // gleng gzhi rim pa'i sbyor bar bcas //
translated: Therefore, the vajra master

original: bshad pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa yis //
translated: who is skilled in the explanatory tantras

original: 'bad de rnal 'byor rgyud gzung ngo //
analyzed: 'bad de rnal 'byor rgyud gzung ngo //
translated: should strive to uphold the yoga tantrasüîΩwith the sequence of the introduction.

original: rgyan rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i rig pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i rig pa'o //
translated: This is the knowledge of the explanation of the seven ornaments.

original: da ni le'u bcu bdun gyi bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni le'u bcu bdun gyi bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the concise meaning of the seventeenth chapter will be explained.

original: de la le'u dang po las ni brjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la //
analyzed: de la le'u dang po las ni brjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la //
translated: In the first chapter, those who are fortunate to listen in the emanation ma·πá·∏çala of Great Vajradhara, who is the nature of the expression and the expressed,

original: rigs pa'i dbang bskur ba byin nas /
analyzed: rigs pa'i dbang bskur ba byin nas /
translated: are given the empowerment of reasoning.

original: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi bye brag gis brtag pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis so sor ston cing /
analyzed: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi bye brag gis brtag pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis so sor ston cing /
translated: The two topics of the stage of generation and the stage of completion are taught separately, with the distinctions of the provisional and definitive meanings.

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i le'u bcu drug po'i don gzhan dag kyang rnyed pas /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i le'u bcu drug po'i don gzhan dag kyang rnyed pas /
translated: Since the topics of the other sixteen chapters that will be explained below are also found,

original: lha'i rnal 'byor gnyis po nyid la 'jug cing gnas pa ste /
analyzed: lha'i rnal 'byor gnyis po nyid la 'jug cing gnas pa ste /
translated: one should enter and abide in the two yogas of the deity.

original: don 'di nyid ni gsang ba 'dus @4a * //
analyzed: don 'di nyid ni gsang ba 'dus @4a * //
translated: This very point is taught in the Guhyasamaja Tantra:üîΩüîΩ

original: pa'i rgyud phyi ma las /
analyzed: pa'i rgyud phyi ma las /
translated: This very point is stated in the Later Tantra of the Guhyasamaja:

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
translated: The Dharma taught by the Buddhas

original: rim pa gnyis la yang dag gnas //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis la yang dag gnas //
translated: is perfectly contained in the two stages:üîΩthe stage of generation

original: bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang // rdzogs pa yi ni rim nyid do //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang // rdzogs pa yi ni rim nyid do // zhes gsungs so //
translated: and the stage of completion.

original: de la le'u gnyis pa las ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig nye bar ston to //
analyzed: de la le'u gnyis pa las ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig nye bar ston to //
translated: In this regard, the second chapter teaches only the stage of completion.

original: le'u gsum pa las ni yongs su dag pa lha'i rnal 'byor gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: le'u gsum pa las ni yongs su dag pa lha'i rnal 'byor gsal bar byed do //
translated: The third chapter clarifies the yoga of the pure deity.

original: le'u bzhi pa las ni dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ston to //
analyzed: le'u bzhi pa las ni dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ston to //
translated: The fourth chapter teaches the mandala of initiation.

original: le'u lnga pa las ni rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa gsungs so //
analyzed: le'u lnga pa las ni rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa gsungs so //
translated: The fifth chapter explains the conduct of yoga.

original: le'u drug pa las ni sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa gsungs so //
analyzed: le'u drug pa las ni sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa gsungs so //
translated: The sixth chapter explains the consecration of body, speech, and mind.

original: le'u bdun pa las ni le'u lnga pa las bshad pa'i spyod pa spros nas bstan to //
analyzed: le'u bdun pa las ni le'u lnga pa las bshad pa'i spyod pa spros nas bstan to //
translated: The seventh chapter elaborates and teaches the conduct explained in the fifth chapter.

original: le'u brgyad pa las ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba gsungs so //
analyzed: le'u brgyad pa las ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba gsungs so //
translated: The eighth chapter explains the secret initiation.

original: le'u brgyad pa las ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba gsungs so //
analyzed: le'u brgyad pa las ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba gsungs so //
translated: In the eighth chapter, the secret consecration is taught.

original: le'u dgu pa las ni rmad du byung ba'i lung bstan pa gsungs so //
analyzed: le'u dgu pa las ni rmad du byung ba'i lung bstan pa gsungs so //
translated: In the ninth chapter, the marvelous prophecy is taught.

original: le'u bcu pa las ni mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub mngon du bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: le'u bcu pa las ni mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub mngon du bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In the tenth chapter, in order to manifest the desired powers,

original: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi lha'i snying po bskul ba gsungs so //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi lha'i snying po bskul ba gsungs so //
translated: the inciting of the essence of the deity, which is of the nature of the outer and inner, is taught.

original: le'u bcu gcig pa las ni sngags kyi sku bskyed pa dang / ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa ston to //
analyzed: le'u bcu gcig pa las ni sngags kyi sku bskyed pa dang / ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa ston to //
translated: In the eleventh chapter, the creation of the mantra body and the creation of the gnosis body are taught.

original: le'u bcu gnyis pa las ni phyag rgya chen po yongs su thim pa gsungs so //
analyzed: le'u bcu gnyis pa las ni phyag rgya chen po yongs su thim pa gsungs so //
translated: In the twelfth chapter, the dissolution of the great seal is taught.

original: le'u bcu gsum ba dang bcu bzhi pa las ni las kyi tshogs rnams gsungs so //
analyzed: le'u bcu gsum ba dang bcu bzhi pa las ni las kyi tshogs rnams gsungs so //
translated: In the thirteenth and fourteenth chapters, the collections of rites are taught.

original: le'u bco lnga pa las ni dngos grub thams cad ni /
analyzed: le'u bco lnga pa las ni dngos grub thams cad ni /
translated: In the fifteenth chapter, in order to demonstrate that all powers

original: de kho na nyid rtogs pa nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de kho na nyid rtogs pa nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs so //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs so //
translated: the illusion-like meditative stabilization is taught.

original: le'u bcu drug pa las ni le'u bzhi pa las dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor spros te gsungs so //
analyzed: le'u bcu drug pa las ni le'u bzhi pa las dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor spros te gsungs so //
translated: In the sixteenth chapter, the mandala of colored powders mentioned in the fourth chapter is expanded and taught.

original: le'u bcu bdun pa las ni dam tshig dang sdom pa rab tu ston pa yin no //
analyzed: le'u bcu bdun pa las ni dam tshig dang sdom pa rab tu ston pa yin no //
translated: In the seventeenth chapter, the commitments and vows are fully taught.

original: da ni le'u bcu bdun po rnams kyi mtha' drug tu tshig rnam par dbye ba dang / bshad pa rnam par dbye ba bya sde /üîΩ'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: da ni le'u bcu bdun po rnams kyi mtha' drug tu tshig rnam par dbye ba dang / bshad pa rnam par dbye ba bya sde / 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Now, the six parameters of the seventeen chapters are to be distinguished in terms of the words and the explanations.

original: bha ga la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ni /
analyzed: bha ga la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ni /
translated: The words are from Thus have I heard up to was dwelling in the bhaga.

original: bshad pa'i tshul rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par bshad do //üîΩbrjod kyis mi lang ba'i zhes bya ba'i 'khor nas brtsams te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i tshul rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par bshad do // brjod kyis mi lang ba'i zhes bya ba'i 'khor nas brtsams te /
translated: This is explained with the four modes of explanation.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la zhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ni drang ba'i don dang @4b nges pa'i don no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la zhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ni drang ba'i don dang @4b nges pa'i don no //
translated: From in an inexpressible circle up to the bodhicitta vajra entered the heart of the Tathagata, this is the interpretable meaning and the definitive meaning.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
translated: The samadhi called ‚Äúvajra-conquering all tathagatas,‚Äù the samadhi called ‚Äúvajra-lamp of wisdom,‚Äù and the samadhi called ‚Äúvajra-deception of body, speech, and mind‚Äù are explained as the four aspects.üîΩThe samadhi called ‚Äúmethod of great passion,‚Äù the samadhi called ‚Äúvajra-origin of commitments,‚Äù the samadhi called ‚Äúglory of the vajra-origin of jewels,‚Äù the samadhi called ‚Äúvajra-origin of great light,‚Äù

original: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po cha 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od chen po 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po cha 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od chen po 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: and the samadhi called ‚Äúvajra-origin of great clouds.‚Äù

original: gdon mi za ba'i mchog dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // rdo rje 'dzin mnyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /üîΩ'dod chags 'dzin pa rjes su chags par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: gdon mi za ba'i mchog dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // rdo rje 'dzin mnyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'dod chags 'dzin pa rjes su chags par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called ‚ÄúVajra of the Arisen Commitment,‚Äù the samadhi called ‚ÄúVajra of the Commitment to Please the Vajra Holder,‚Äù the samadhi called ‚ÄúVajra of Pleasing All Tathagatas,‚ÄùüîΩthe samadhi called ‚ÄúVajra of Pleasing the Passionate One,‚Äù the samadhi called ‚ÄúVajra Wheel of Vairocana,‚Äù the samadhi called ‚ÄúVajra of the Manifest Enlightenment of All Tathagatas,‚Äù

original: chos rin po che 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sku gsung thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: chos rin po che 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sku gsung thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to //
translated: the samadhi called ‚ÄúSource of the Jewel of Dharma,‚Äù and the samadhi called ‚ÄúVajra of Body, Speech, and Mind.‚Äù

original: sku gsung thugs gsang ba zhes bya ba dang / 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig ni tshul rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs gsang ba zhes bya ba dang / 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig ni tshul rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
translated: The words secret of body, speech, and mind, gathering, and arisen from the commitment of the vajra are explained in four ways.

original: rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs zhes bya ba dang / mchod pa spros par gyur pa'i dam tshig rin po che'i sprin zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs zhes bya ba dang / mchod pa spros par gyur pa'i dam tshig rin po che'i sprin zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to //
translated: The words form of the great being of knowledge and commitment cloud of precious emanated offerings are of provisional and definitive meanings.

original: ae ma ho //
analyzed: ae ma ho //
translated: Emaho!

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: Of all the buddhas,

original: byang chub sems ni rab byung ba //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rab byung ba //
translated: the bodhicitta has arisen,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
translated: the secret of all the tathƒÅgatas,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bzhugs so zhes dgongs te drang ba'i don to //

analyzed: rdo rje'i skye mched nyid dag kyang //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bus 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: de ltar ston pa dang / gnas dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par bstan nas /

translated: in order to demonstrate liberation through the five sense objects to those beings who are attached to the objects of the desire realm,

analyzed: pa'i phyir / de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'o //

analyzed: yon tan brgyad kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //

original: chen po yang yin la rnam par snang mdzad kyang yin pas na rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste /
analyzed: chen po yang yin la rnam par snang mdzad kyang yin pas na rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste /

analyzed: 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags rab tu spang bar bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sku spangs nas /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po ni /

original: de nyid kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas /

analyzed: rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus drangs nas nyid kyi sku la phung po dang / khams la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis zhugs par gyur to //

original: zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to /

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chad chen po'i sku la zhugs ba dang bcom ldan 'das yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chad chen po'i sku la zhugs ba dang bcom ldan 'das yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mchog tu dga' ba'i bde bas tshim par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: gnas skabs snga ma spangs te lha'i bu mo'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las byung bar gyur to //

original: de la la la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: de la la la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa ste /

original: sa'i khams ne sangs rgyas spyan lta bu'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams ne sangs rgyas spyan lta bu'o //

original: chu'i khams ni m'a ma k'i lta bu'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams ni m'a ma k'i lta bu'o //

original: me'i khams ni gos dkar mo lta bu'o //
analyzed: me'i khams ni gos dkar mo lta bu'o //

original: rlung gi khams ni sol ma lta bur gnas pa'o /
analyzed: rlung gi khams ni sol ma lta bur gnas pa'o /

original: yang rnam par snang mdzad ni gzugs kyi ngo bo lta bu'o //
analyzed: yang rnam par snang mdzad ni gzugs kyi ngo bo lta bu'o //

original: rin chen 'byung ldan ni sgra'i ngo bo lta bu'o //üîΩsnang ba mtha' yas ni dri'i ngo bo lta bu'o //üîΩdon yod par grub pa ni ro'i ngo bo lta bu'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan ni sgra'i ngo bo lta bu'o // snang ba mtha' yas ni dri'i ngo bo lta bu'o // don yod par grub pa ni ro'i ngo bo lta bu'o //
translated: Ratnasambhava is like the essence of sound.üîΩAmitabha is like the essence of smell.üîΩAmoghasiddhi is like the essence of taste.

original: mi bskyod pa ni reg bya'i ngo bo lta bu'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa ni reg bya'i ngo bo lta bu'o //

original: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste drang ba'i don @13b to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste drang ba'i don @13b to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning.

original: 'dod chags kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas 'dod chags chen po ste 'dod chags chen po'i chos so //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas 'dod chags chen po ste 'dod chags chen po'i chos so //

analyzed: de'i tshul ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags par ma la sogs pa'i rim gyis rnam par dag pa mngon du 'byin pa'i thabs te /

analyzed: de nyid kyi ming dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: He enters into the body of all those Tathagatas in the retinue.

original: zhes bya ba'i don ni phyi rol gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag tu dmigs pa'i mngon par zhen pa spangs nas /üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las yongs su bsgrub pa'i sku na bdag yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don ni phyi rol gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag tu dmigs pa'i mngon par zhen pa spangs nas / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las yongs su bsgrub pa'i sku na bdag yin no //
translated: The meaning of that is that, having abandoned the adherence to the objective appearances of those Tathagatas in the retinue,

original: zhes byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: he is blessed with the thought, ‚ÄúI am the body that is accomplished from all the Tathagatas.‚Äù

original: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad ste //
analyzed: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad ste //

analyzed: rgyal sras thams cad nyid kyang yin //

original: zhes lung las gsungs pas so //
analyzed: zhes lung las gsungs pas so //

analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te nges pa'i don to //

analyzed: shes rab kyi gnas der chud par gru bzhi la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul par mdzad pa'o //

original: dri ma thams cad dang bral bas rdul med pa'o //

original: dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po yin te /

analyzed: gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid // ces bya ba ni gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang shel gyi nang du chud pa'i gzugs sa snang ba ltar /
translated: The nature of that clarity

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi sku mthong bas so //

original: sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du rgyas //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du rgyas //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aindra n'i la la sogs pa kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i gsungs @14a * //

analyzed: pa'o // sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab // ces bya ba ni /

translated: means that it is filled with the deities of the emanated mandala.

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la sogs pa ni gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor te /

original: de rnams dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He possesses those.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //üîΩzhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas // zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas te /
translated: The abode of all tathƒÅgatas.

analyzed: rten gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the ma·πá·∏çala of the support is the abode of all tathƒÅgatas.üîΩThen, having placed himself in the ma·πá·∏çala of the great pledge,

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po de bshad ma thag pa'i dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su bdag nyid bzhag par gyur ba'o //üîΩde nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

translated: the lord of body, speech, and mind, Great Vajradhara,

analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la zhugs pa'o zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: rigs lngas bsdus pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor slar yang byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i sku la zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba ste /

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The tathƒÅgata Ak·π£obhya is the nature of consciousness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa yin la /
translated: All tathƒÅgatas are the form aggregate, etc.

original: de rnams kyi gang brtan cing bzhugs pa'i gnas su mdzad pa'i btsun mo ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gang brtan cing bzhugs pa'i gnas su mdzad pa'i btsun mo ste /
translated: She is the queen who is the place of their firm abiding.

analyzed: sbas pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po lnga rnams so //

analyzed: de rnams zil gyis mnan pa ni don dam pa'i bden pas gcig tu mdzad pa'o //

original: de nyid mi phyed pas rdo rje ste /

analyzed: de ltar lhag par mos pas @15b rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed nas /

analyzed: de las byung bas na skyes pa'o //

analyzed: chen po zhes ni bshad pa yin //
translated: This is explained as ‚Äúgreat. ‚Äù

original: zhes gsungs pas rig pa chen po ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas rig pa chen po ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Thus, the great knowledge is the ultimate truth.

original: skyes bu ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The person is the conventional truth.

original: de dag las bskyed pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la sogs pa @16a * //
analyzed: de dag las bskyed pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la sogs pa @16a * //
translated: The one endowed with the supreme of all aspects, etc.

original: dang bcas pa'i skyes bu lta bu'i lha'i sku ni rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs te rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: dang bcas pa'i skyes bu lta bu'i lha'i sku ni rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs te rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: generated from those, is the divine body like a person, the form of the person of great knowledge, which is Great Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so //
translated: He is blessed by the blessing of the mantra of all the Tathagatas.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra rab las bsgrubs pas bdag nyid bskyed pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra rab las bsgrubs pas bdag nyid bskyed pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This means that he is generated by himself, created from the atoms of all the Tathagatas.

original: byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te nges pa'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúImmediately after the consecration‚Äù and so forth is as before, and is of definitive meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, and so forth.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dga' ba'i thugs kyis sngar bshad pa'i thugs ka nas byung ste ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dga' ba'i thugs kyis sngar bshad pa'i thugs ka nas byung ste ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: The Tathagatas Akshobhya and so forth, with delighted minds, emerge from the heart as previously explained, and utter this declaration.

original: ae ma'o // zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: ae ma'o // zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAmazing!‚Äù is the amazement.

original: hi zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: hi zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúhi‚Äù means ‚Äúfor what reason?‚Äù

original: byang chub sems ni rab byung ba //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rab byung ba //
translated: The bodhicitta has arisen.

original: zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku rnam pa gnyis gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud las rab tu byung ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku rnam pa gnyis gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud las rab tu byung ba ni /
translated: The two kinds of divine bodies are arisen in the mindstreams of those to be tamed,

original: byang chub sems ni rab tu byung ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rab tu byung ba'o //
translated: and the bodhicitta has arisen.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúOf all the Tathagatas‚Äù means

original: 'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that this is the case for all the Tathagatas.

original: sba bar bya ba yin pas na gsang ba'o //
analyzed: sba bar bya ba yin pas na gsang ba'o //
translated: It is secret because it is to be concealed.

original: brtag pa dang bral bas na rab tu mi rtog go //
analyzed: brtag pa dang bral bas na rab tu mi rtog go //
translated: It is non-conceptual because it is free from investigation.

original: khams gsum la mi gnas pas na gnas pa med pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: khams gsum la mi gnas pas na gnas pa med pa zhes bya ste /
translated: It is said to be non-abiding because it does not abide in the three realms.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the indirect explanation.

original: da ni ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya rnams la slob dpon dang slob ma'i 'brel pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya rnams la slob dpon dang slob ma'i 'brel pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to show the connection between master and disciple for future disciples,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the text] says then and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
translated: Then refers to what was just explained.

original: gcig tu 'dus nas zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa mdzad nas /
analyzed: gcig tu 'dus nas zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa mdzad nas /
translated: Having gathered together means having assembled.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa de kho na nyid dam tshig rin po che'i rgya mtsho'i tshogs ni sprin te de rnams kyis mchod de 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa de kho na nyid dam tshig rin po che'i rgya mtsho'i tshogs ni sprin te de rnams kyis mchod de 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don to //
translated: The cloud of the assembly of the ocean of the precious reality commitments of the proliferation of the offerings to all tathƒÅgatas is the cloud. Having made offerings with those, [they] said this. This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
translated: All tathƒÅgatas are form and so forth.

original: de rnams dang ldan pa'i mchod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang ldan pa'i mchod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'o //
translated: The worship endowed with those is the worship of all the Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: de'i rgyas pa ni mang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyas pa ni mang du byas pa'o //
translated: Its expansion is its being done much.

original: de kho na nyid kyi rin po che ni bud med rin po che'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi rin po che ni bud med rin po che'o //
translated: The jewel of suchness is the jewel woman.üîΩThe pledge is that which is not to be transgressed.

original: dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa ste de rnams kyi sprin ni tshogs te /
analyzed: dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa ste de rnams kyi sprin ni tshogs te /
translated: The cloud of those is the mass.üîΩHaving worshipped with that, having bowed down, he said this.

original: des mchod de phyag 'tshal @16b nas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to //üîΩ'dus pa gsang ba bshad du gsol //
analyzed: des mchod de phyag 'tshal @16b nas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to // 'dus pa gsang ba bshad du gsol //
translated: This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The request is Please explain the secret assembly.

original: 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The word assembly

original: gnyis gcig tu gyur pa ni 'dus pa ste yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis gcig tu gyur pa ni 'dus pa ste yi ge'i don to //
translated: is the coming together of two into one. This is the literal meaning.

original: rdo rje dang / padma yang dag par sbyor ba ni 'dus pa ste spyi'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje dang / padma yang dag par sbyor ba ni 'dus pa ste spyi'i don to //
translated: The union of the vajra and lotus is the assembly. This is the general meaning.

original: shes rab dang thabs yang dag par sbyor ba ni 'dus pa ste sbas pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs yang dag par sbyor ba ni 'dus pa ste sbas pa'o //
translated: The union of wisdom and method is the assembly. This is the hidden meaning.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag 'dres pa ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag 'dres pa ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: The mixing of the conventional and ultimate truths is the assembly. This is the ultimate meaning.

original: gsang ba las byung ba ni /
analyzed: gsang ba las byung ba ni /
translated: The arisen from the secret

original: de nyid kyi khyad par ste gsang ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi khyad par ste gsang ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: is a particularity of that, and the secret is the clear light.

original: de las byung ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba'i bar du ste mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba'i bar du ste mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The arisen from that is the Great Vajradhara, whose nature is the nondual exalted wisdom, and is the ultimate.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
translated: The secret of all Ones-Gone-Thus

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the meaning of the above verse.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i gsang zhing sba bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i gsang zhing sba bar bya'o //
translated: the secret to be guarded and concealed of all Ones-Gone-Thus in a lineage from one to another.

original: rdo rje snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The vajra essence is the Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: de rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: The gathering is their characteristic of becoming one.

original: de kho na nyid ni ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'o //
translated: The suchness is the way things are.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
translated: Then is immediately after.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: The Thought Vajra said to all Ones-Gone-Thus, Excellent, excellent!üîΩExcellent, excellent! is

original: legs so legs so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: legs so legs so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Excellent, excellent!üîΩüîΩ

original: zhal gyis bzhes par mdzad pa ste dris pa'i don mngon par 'dod pa ston pas so //
analyzed: zhal gyis bzhes par mdzad pa ste dris pa'i don mngon par 'dod pa ston pas so //
translated: He assents to it, because he teaches the meaning of the question as it is desired.

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rnam par brtag pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rnam par brtag pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúhowever‚Äù indicates a different topic.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúEven the TathƒÅgatas have doubts‚Äù means

original: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ni slob bzhin pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin par blta bar bya'i /
analyzed: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ni slob bzhin pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin par blta bar bya'i /
translated: that here the TathƒÅgatas and Bodhisattvas are to be regarded as yogis who are still in training.

original: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni som nyi yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni som nyi yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, who have abandoned the afflictions along with their propensities, do not have doubts.

original: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here, the TathƒÅgatas are

original: rin po che lta bu'i gang zag dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod cing rigs nges pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che lta bu'i gang zag dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod cing rigs nges pa'o //
translated: those individuals who are like jewels, whose roots of virtue are fully ripened, who have reached the culmination of learning, who aspire to buddhahood, and who are of definite lineage.

original: 'dus pa'i don ni bla ma'i lung dang bral na de rnams kyi yang yul ma yin ta brtag pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i don ni bla ma'i lung dang bral na de rnams kyi yang yul ma yin ta brtag pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the compound is that if one is devoid of the guru‚Äôs instruction, then these are not even the domain of the bodhisattvas, because they are devoid of analysis.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos @17a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos @17a * //
translated: What need is there to speak of other bodhisattvas?

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is saying that

original: tsandan lta bu'i gang zag la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa /
analyzed: tsandan lta bu'i gang zag la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa /
translated: it is difficult to understand for those individuals who are like sandalwood and so on, whose roots of virtue are not fully ripened,üîΩand whose interest is inferior.

original: mos pa dman pa rnams kyis rtogs pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: mos pa dman pa rnams kyis rtogs pa lta ci smos /
translated: What need is there to speak of those who are like white lotuses and so on, whose lineage is not fixed?

original: gzung bar dka' zhing spro ba med pa nyid du brda sprod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzung bar dka' zhing spro ba med pa nyid du brda sprod pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the difficulty of understanding and the lack of enthusiasm.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas rin po che lta bu'i gang zag rigs nges pa rnams kyi yang 'di yul ma yin no zhes bas ni ngo mtshar du gyur la /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas rin po che lta bu'i gang zag rigs nges pa rnams kyi yang 'di yul ma yin no zhes bas ni ngo mtshar du gyur la /
translated: Having heard the BhagavƒÅn‚Äôs speech, those individuals who are like jewels and whose lineage is fixed think, ‚ÄúThis is not even the domain of those individuals who are like sandalwood and so on, whose roots of virtue are not fully ripened, and whose interest is inferior.‚Äù This is the astonishment.

original: padma dkar po lta bu la sogs pa rigs ma nges pa rnams kyis lta ci smos pa zhes pas ni rmad du gyur nas /
analyzed: padma dkar po lta bu la sogs pa rigs ma nges pa rnams kyis lta ci smos pa zhes pas ni rmad du gyur nas /
translated: Those individuals who are like white lotuses and so on, whose lineage is not fixed, think, ‚ÄúWhat need is there to speak of those individuals who are like white lotuses and so on, whose lineage is not fixed?‚Äù This is the amazement.

original: slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Again, all the Tathagatas said this to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can du gyur pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can du gyur pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The Bhagavat has become endowed with such special qualities, and so forth.

original: gang gi phyir 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par du gyur pa la yang zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i gang zag nyid yin par ston pa yin te dgongs pas bshad pa'o//
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par du gyur pa la yang zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i gang zag nyid yin par ston pa yin te dgongs pas bshad pa'o//
translated: Because of this, and so forth means that he is a precious person, and this is the intention of the explanation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The secret of the body, speech, and mind of all Tathagatas

original: dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa rigs gsum du yongs su gyur pa ste yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa rigs gsum du yongs su gyur pa ste yi ge'i don to //
translated: is the transformation into the three families of the commitments, vows, and so forth. This is the word-meaning.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni yi ge gsum ste spyi'i don no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni yi ge gsum ste spyi'i don no //
translated: The secret of the body, speech, and mind of all Tathagatas is the three syllables. This is the general meaning.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni ye shes gsum po rang bzhin gyi snang ba rlung gi bzhon pa dang ldan pa ste sbas pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni ye shes gsum po rang bzhin gyi snang ba rlung gi bzhon pa dang ldan pa ste sbas pa'o //
translated: The secret of the body, speech, and mind of all Ones Gone Thus is the three exalted wisdoms endowed with the mount of the wind, that is, concealed.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ste mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ste mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The secret of the body, speech, and mind of all Ones Gone Thus is the body of the nature of exalted wisdom, that is, ultimate.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis byin gyis brlab par mdzad nas bstan du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis byin gyis brlab par mdzad nas bstan du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: Having blessed with the words of the origin of the vajra commitments of all Ones Gone to Bliss, please teach.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa ni sku la sogs par zhugs pa ste mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa ni sku la sogs par zhugs pa ste mdzad pa'o //
translated: The blessing of all Ones Gone to Bliss is the entry into the body, and so forth, that is, the deeds.

original: gang gis zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis zhe na /
translated: By whom?üîΩWith the words of the origin of the vajra commitments of all Ones Gone to Bliss.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis zhes bya ba ste yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis zhes bya ba ste yi ge'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ni /
translated: The vajra commitments of all the transcendent ones are

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste de rnams 'byung ba'i tshig ni de bskyed pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge ste @17b spyi'i don to //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste de rnams 'byung ba'i tshig ni de bskyed pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge ste @17b spyi'i don to //
translated: Vajra Body and so forth. The words that arise from them are the seed syllables that generate them. This is the general meaning.

original: rdo rje dam tshig ni dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig ni dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: The vajra commitment is the union of the two organs.

original: de las byung ba'i tshig ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i tshig ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'o //
translated: The words that arise from that are the bindu of bodhicitta.

original: des byin gyis brlabs pa ni dbang bskur ba byas pa ste sbas pa'o //
analyzed: des byin gyis brlabs pa ni dbang bskur ba byas pa ste sbas pa'o //
translated: The empowerment conferred by that is the empowerment that is conferred. This is the hidden meaning.

original: rdo rje dam tshig ni 'od gsal pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig ni 'od gsal pa'o //
translated: The vajra commitment is clear light.

original: de las byung ba'i tshig ni chen po stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i tshig ni chen po stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa nyid do //
translated: The words that arise from that are the great emptiness, the utter emptiness, and the emptiness of emptiness.

original: des byin gyis brlab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya'i skye ba'i rgyud la lha'i sku rnam pa gnyis gsal bar mdzad pa yin la de yang dag par ston par mdzod cig pa ste mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: des byin gyis brlab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya'i skye ba'i rgyud la lha'i sku rnam pa gnyis gsal bar mdzad pa yin la de yang dag par ston par mdzod cig pa ste mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The empowerment conferred by that is the BhagavƒÅn‚Äôs manifestation of the two bodies of the deity in the mind streams of disciples to be tamed. This is the ultimate.

original: de ltar gsol ba btab pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas de rnams la dbang bskur ba'i phyir ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sprul par mdzad do /

analyzed: dpal rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /

analyzed: khams gsum na ni gzhan med de //

original: sgyu mar gyur pa rang srog la //
analyzed: sgyu mar gyur pa rang srog la //
translated: In the illusory, from one‚Äôs own life,

analyzed: rmi lam rmi ba bzhin du blta //

original: khams gsum bdag nyid de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: khams gsum bdag nyid de bzhin nyid //

analyzed: gcig tu myur bar mthong ba ni //

analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin nyid //

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //

original: ae ma ho zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ae ma ho zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: kun du bzang po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: kun du bzang po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /

analyzed: de'i byang chub kyi sems rab tu bstan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes pa'o //

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /

analyzed: skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis su //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ste skye ba med pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //

analyzed: der yid kyi rang bzhin gyis lus kyi 'jug pa ni skye ba med pa'i tshul te /

translated: The arising of that is the arising of the body of complete purification from clear light, which is the arising of the body of the deity. This is the arising that is proclaimed and expressed. This is the non-intentional interpretation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa drug po rnams kyi ji ltar rang rang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid ji lta bar ston par mdzad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa drug po rnams kyi ji ltar rang rang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid ji lta bar ston par mdzad de /
translated: The six transcendent lords teach this very concentration by means of verses on the enlightenment spirit of each of them.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs @24a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs @24a * //
translated: The Tantra of the Great and Perfect Dynamic Energy of the LionüîΩ

analyzed: par byang chub pa ni bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid do //

original: de'i tshul ni de mngon sum du bya ba'i thabs so //
analyzed: de'i tshul ni de mngon sum du bya ba'i thabs so //
translated: The method of that is the means of realizing that.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
translated: That itself is a vajra because it is indivisible,

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //

original: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni med pa yin na ni sgom pa med pa ste bsgom par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni med pa yin na ni sgom pa med pa ste bsgom par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the nature of all things, moving and unmoving, is non-existent, there is no meditation, because there is nothing to meditate on.

original: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
translated: Meditation is not something to be meditated on.

original: zhes bya ba ni /üîΩgang yod par bsgom pa de yang bsgom pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / gang yod par bsgom pa de yang bsgom pa ma yin te /
