analyzed: bsgom par bya ba dang bral bas yod pa ma yin bas so //
translated: because it is not existent, being free from what is to be meditated on.

original: de ltar zhes pa ni dngos po med pa dang dngos po yod par 'dod pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa nyid de phyogs gnyig dang 'gal lo //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa ni dngos po med pa dang dngos po yod par 'dod pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa nyid de phyogs gnyig dang 'gal lo //
translated: Thus, that which is endowed with the assertion of the existence of things and the non-existence of things is itself the non-existence of things, and is in conflict with both positions.

original: de bas na bsgom par bya ba dang sgom pa po dang bsgom pa dmigs su med pa ste yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: de bas na bsgom par bya ba dang sgom pa po dang bsgom pa dmigs su med pa ste yi ge'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the object of meditation, the meditator, and the meditation are not perceived. This is the meaning of the words.

original: steng 'og la sogs pa'i dbye bas chos thams cad rnam par bsal nas /
analyzed: steng 'og la sogs pa'i dbye bas chos thams cad rnam par bsal nas /
translated: Having eliminated all phenomena by the division of above, below, etc.,

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ni stong pa'i zhes kyang bsgom pa ni med de /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ni stong pa'i zhes kyang bsgom pa ni med de /
translated: conditioned and unconditioned phenomena are not meditated upon as empty.

original: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa'i lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa'i lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a view that is attached to emptiness.

original: mtshan ma bzlog par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mtshan ma bzlog par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to reverse the sign,

original: bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min //
translated: the object of meditation is not meditation.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is stated.

original: gang yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen nas sgom na //
analyzed: gang yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen nas sgom na //
translated: If one meditates while attached to the aspect of cause and effect,

original: de nyid kyang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that itself is not reasonable.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no duality of cause and effect.

original: smon pa bzlog pa'i phyir de ltar dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: smon pa bzlog pa'i phyir de ltar dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to stop the wish, he says, ‚ÄúThus, a thing, etc.‚Äù

original: de ltar phyi rol gyi rnam pa'i smon pa'i 'bras bu de yang med de /
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol gyi rnam pa'i smon pa'i 'bras bu de yang med de /
translated: Thus, that result of the wish for external aspects also does not exist,

original: smon lam la sogs pa'i nye bar dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: smon lam la sogs pa'i nye bar dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no apprehension of a vow, etc.

original: de bas na phyi rol gyi dngos po lta bur sgom pa dmigs su med cing yod pa ma yin te sems kyi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na phyi rol gyi dngos po lta bur sgom pa dmigs su med cing yod pa ma yin te sems kyi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, meditation is not apprehended as an external thing, and does not exist, because of the absence of the nature of mind.

original: spyi'i don to //
analyzed: spyi'i don to //
translated: The general meaning.

original: dngos po med pa ni gang phung po la sogs pa de rnams ni dngos po med pa ste bsgom par bya bar gyur pa de sems tsam gang yin pa de ni dngos po med de rnam par ma dag pa dang / rtag tu med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni gang phung po la sogs pa de rnams ni dngos po med pa ste bsgom par bya bar gyur pa de sems tsam gang yin pa de ni dngos po med de rnam par ma dag pa dang / rtag tu med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The non-existence of things is that those aggregates, etc. are non-existent things, and that which is to be meditated upon is just mind. That is non-existent, because of the absence of purity and permanence.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to stop the conventional truth, he says,üîΩ‚ÄúThe non-existence of things, etc.‚Äù

original: bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The meditation is not the meditation.

original: gang @24b kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can sgyu ma lta bu'i lha'i sku sgom pa de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: gang @24b kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can sgyu ma lta bu'i lha'i sku sgom pa de yang mi rigs te /
translated: That meditation on the illusory deity body, which has the nature of the conventional truth, is also not tenable,

original: 'od gsal bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od gsal bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is purified by clear light.

original: de ltar na kun rdzob kyi bden pa tsam gyis dngos po ni dngos po ma yin te bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar na kun rdzob kyi bden pa tsam gyis dngos po ni dngos po ma yin te bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, an entity that is merely the conventional truth is not an entity, because the two truths are inseparable.

original: de bas na bsgom pa ste bden pa gnyis lta bur bsgom pa ni dmigs su med de mi dmigs pa yin pas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste sbas pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na bsgom pa ste bden pa gnyis lta bur bsgom pa ni dmigs su med de mi dmigs pa yin pas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste sbas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the meditation, which is like the two truths, is not an object of meditation, because it is not an object of perception.

original: dngos po med pa don dam pa'i bden pa la sgom pa med pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa don dam pa'i bden pa la sgom pa med pa ste /
translated: The meditation on the ultimate truth, which is the absence of an entity, is not a meditation.

original: gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is pure from the beginning.

original: gang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can du bsgom pa de yang /
analyzed: gang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can du bsgom pa de yang /
translated: That meditation on the conventional truth, which has the nature of the conventional truth,üîΩis also not tenable,üîΩbecause it is purified by clear light.

original: bsgom par bya ba ma yin te mi bden pa nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'dis bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po bsgom par bya bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba ma yin te mi bden pa nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'dis bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po bsgom par bya bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is not to be cultivated, because it is not true. In this way, the entity which is the nature of the two truths is not to be cultivated,

original: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par mthong ba tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par mthong ba tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because one is liberated merely by seeing the two truths as non-dual.

original: de bas na sgom pa po dang / bsgom pa dang / bsgom par bya'o zhes 'di ltar mngon par zhen pa ni /
analyzed: de bas na sgom pa po dang / bsgom pa dang / bsgom par bya'o zhes 'di ltar mngon par zhen pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the clinging to the meditator, meditation, and what is to be meditated upon

original: zung du sbyor bas 'jug pa'i rim pa rtogs pa rnams la dmigs su med de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zung du sbyor bas 'jug pa'i rim pa rtogs pa rnams la dmigs su med de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: is not found, does not exist, for those who understand the process of engagement through union.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs te mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs te mthar thug pa'o //
translated: Thus it is said by the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, the ultimate.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba sbyar te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba sbyar te /
translated: Then the Blessed One Vairocana spoke of this.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa kun nas mngon par rtogs pa ni 'od gsal ba thugs su chud pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa kun nas mngon par rtogs pa ni 'od gsal ba thugs su chud pa'o //
translated: The realization of all the Tathagatas is the realization of clear light.

original: de nyid rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de la dmigs pa'o //
translated: That is the vajra samƒÅdhi, which is the object of that .

original: dngos po thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for ‚Äúall things‚Äù and so forth,

original: snod du gyur pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral ba dang / yang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi bdag nyid can gyu gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa'o //
analyzed: snod du gyur pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral ba dang / yang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi bdag nyid can gyu gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa'o //
translated: it is free from all things that are suitable as a vessel, and also it is the abandonment of the apprehended and the apprehender, which has the nature of the aggregates, the constituents, and the sense-fields.

original: chos bdag med pa ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: chos bdag med pa ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: The selflessness of phenomena is natural luminosity.

original: de dang mnyam pa nyid ni gnyis su med pa yin par dngos so //
analyzed: de dang mnyam pa nyid ni gnyis su med pa yin par dngos so //
translated: That sameness with that is non-duality.

original: chos bdag med pa de rnams dang mnyam pa nyid yin pas rang gi sems ye nas ma skyes pa rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i lus stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo ste mig gi spyod yul tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos bdag med pa de rnams dang mnyam pa nyid yin pas rang gi sems ye nas ma skyes pa rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i lus stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo ste mig gi spyod yul tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is the sameness with those selflessnesses of phenomena, one‚Äôs mind is primordially unborn, the body of the indivisible three vajras, the essence of emptiness, because it is merely the domain of the eyes.

original: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa ste dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa ste dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Thus it is said by the TathƒÅgata Vairocana, and it is not the implied meaning.

original: de bzhin @25a * //
analyzed: de bzhin @25a * //
translated: Thus,

original: gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The inexhaustible of all the TathƒÅgatas is the limit of reality.

original: de nyid rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ste /
translated: That itself is the vajra.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: The samƒÅdhi that has that as its object is called the ‚Äúinexhaustible vajra of all the TathƒÅgatas.‚Äù

original: dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa //
analyzed: dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa //
translated: These things are unborn.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa ste rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa ste rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: These things, which have the nature of the internal and the external, are unborn, because they are naturally luminous.

original: de bas na chos rnams med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de bas na chos rnams med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, phenomena are indeed nonexistent.

original: chos nyid med pa ste zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi chos nyid kyang yod pa ma yin te chos rnams med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos nyid med pa ste zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi chos nyid kyang yod pa ma yin te chos rnams med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reality of those does not exist, because the reality of those does not exist, because phenomena do not exist.

original: de bas na 'di ltar nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can 'od gsal ba ste byang chub kyi sems 'di ni byang chub pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ltar nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can 'od gsal ba ste byang chub kyi sems 'di ni byang chub pa'i thabs so //
translated: Therefore, this enlightenment mind, which has the characteristic of selflessness like space, is luminous, and is the means of enlightenment.

original: bstan pa 'di snying po yod pa ste nam mkha' lta bu yin no //
analyzed: bstan pa 'di snying po yod pa ste nam mkha' lta bu yin no //
translated: This teaching is the essence, which is like space.

original: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsungs pa te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsungs pa te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Thus spoke the Tathagata Akshobhya. This is not the implied meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The selflessness of all Tathagatas is the ultimate truth.

original: de nyid rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ste /
translated: That itself is the vajra.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The samadhi which has that as its object is the samadhi called the vajra of the selflessness of all Tathagatas.

original: chos rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa rnams so ;
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa rnams so ;
translated: All phenomena are those with and without impurity.

original: / dngos po med cing zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / dngos po med cing zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are non-existent because they are signless.

original: chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs //
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs //
translated: The characteristic of phenomena is abandoned.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is because

original: chos rnams nyid ma grub na de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ga la yod de /
analyzed: chos rnams nyid ma grub na de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ga la yod de /
translated: if phenomena themselves are not established, how can their characteristics exist?

original: mo gsham gyi bu'i ljang ba dang dkar ba la sogs pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu'i ljang ba dang dkar ba la sogs pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: It is like the greenness and whiteness, etc. of the son of a barren woman.

original: 'o na ji ltar lha'i dku bskyed ce na /üîΩbdag med chos las kun du 'byung //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar lha'i dku bskyed ce na / bdag med chos las kun du 'byung //
translated: How then is the god generated in the heart?

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It arises from the teaching of non-self.

original: bdag med pa'i chos ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
analyzed: bdag med pa'i chos ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
translated: The teaching of non-self is the ultimate truth.

original: de las rang la bying yis brlab pa'i rim gyis kun du 'byung bas na /
analyzed: de las rang la bying yis brlab pa'i rim gyis kun du 'byung bas na /
translated: From that, it arises in oneself through the process of consecration.

original: bdag med chos las kun 'byung ste //
analyzed: bdag med chos las kun 'byung ste //
translated: Thus, it arises from the teaching of non-self.

original: sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyis byung ba'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyis byung ba'o //
translated: It arises by the force of previous impetus.

original: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyis gsungs te dngos pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyis gsungs te dngos pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Thus it is said by the Tathagata Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la 'od zer 'bar nyid ni sgron ma yin pas na 'od zer 'bar ba'i sgron ma ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la 'od zer 'bar nyid ni sgron ma yin pas na 'od zer 'bar ba'i sgron ma ste /
translated: Then, the blazing light rays are the lamp, thus it is the blazing light ray lamp.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'od gsal ba'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of clear light.

original: de nyid rdo rje ste de la dmigs pa ting nge 'dzin ni 'od @25b zer 'bar bsgron ma rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ste de la dmigs pa ting nge 'dzin ni 'od @25b zer 'bar bsgron ma rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: That itself is the vajra, and the samƒÅdhi that focuses on that is called the blazing light ray lamp vajra.

original: ma skyes pa yin zhes pa ni ma byung ba la'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa yin zhes pa ni ma byung ba la'o //
translated: It is unborn, meaning it does not occur.

original: chos rnams la zhes bya ba ni 'dis byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams la'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la zhes bya ba ni 'dis byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOf phenomena‚Äù means of the compounded and uncompounded.

original: ngo bo med ces bya ba ni bsgom par bya ba med pa'i //
analyzed: ngo bo med ces bya ba ni bsgom par bya ba med pa'i //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout essence‚Äù means without something to be cultivated.

original: bsgom pa'ang med ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsgom pa'ang med ces bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúCultivation is also absent‚Äù means

original: bsgom pa'ang med de bsgom par bya ba rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa'ang med de bsgom par bya ba rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: cultivation is also absent, because the nature of something to be cultivated is absent.

original: 'o na lha'i rnal 'byor du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na lha'i rnal 'byor du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is it divine yoga?

original: nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the method of space,

original: zhes bya ba gsung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsung ste /
translated: he says.

original: nam mkha' ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Space is ultimate truth.

original: tshul ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: tshul ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: Method is relative truth.

original: de gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni gcig tu gyur pa ste de dag gis ni //
analyzed: de gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni gcig tu gyur pa ste de dag gis ni //
translated: Their union is their oneness.

original: nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the method of space,

original: zhes bya ba yin par dgongs so //üîΩdngos po dag tu rab tu bsgrags //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin par dgongs so // dngos po dag tu rab tu bsgrags //
translated: he thinks, ‚Äúis the union.‚ÄùüîΩThings are proclaimed.

original: zhes bya ba ni /üîΩtshul 'dis dngos po ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / tshul 'dis dngos po ste /
translated: Things means

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku rab tu bsgrags shing bshad do //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku rab tu bsgrags shing bshad do //
translated: the body of Great Vajradhara.

original: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas gsungs te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas gsungs te dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Thus has spoken the Tathagata Amitabha. This is not the intended meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Then, etc., as before.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bshad zin to //
translated: The samadhi called ‚ÄúVajra Overpowering All Tathagatas‚Äù has been explained.

original: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
translated: The nature of phenomena is clear light.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin dang 'od gsal ba ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin dang 'od gsal ba ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: The nature and the clear light are the nature clear light.

original: rang bzhin ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The nature is the conventional truth.

original: 'od gsal ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The clear light is the ultimate truth.

original: phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams ni bden pa gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams ni bden pa gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Outer and inner things are the essence of the two truths.

original: de bas na gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin te /
analyzed: de bas na gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin te /
translated: Therefore, primordially pure like space,

original: yongs su dag pas na byang chub med pa ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: yongs su dag pas na byang chub med pa ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: being completely pure, the absence of enlightenment is the essence of the result.

original: mngon rtogs med pa ni thob pa'i rgyu ste rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon rtogs med pa ni thob pa'i rgyu ste rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The absence of clear realization is the cause of attainment, because cause and effect are inseparable.

original: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching of the method of enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is said.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag mi phyed par yongs su shes pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag mi phyed par yongs su shes pa nyid ni /
translated: The complete knowledge of cause and effect as inseparable

original: byang chub kyi lam brtan po yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi lam brtan po yin no //
translated: is the firm path of enlightenment.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pas gsungs pa ste dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pas gsungs pa ste dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is what is said by the Blessed One Amoghasiddhi, and it is not a covert intention.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyi sku'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyi sku'o //
translated: The secret of the body, speech, and mind of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is the mind-made body.

original: de'i chos nyid ni don dam pa'i bden pas rna par dag pa'o //
analyzed: de'i chos nyid ni don dam pa'i bden pas rna par dag pa'o //
translated: Its reality is purity by way of the ultimate truth.

original: de'i yi ge tshig de gsal bar byed pa'i dag gi @26a * //
analyzed: de'i yi ge tshig de gsal bar byed pa'i dag gi @26a * //
translated: The collection of the syllables and words that express that

original: tshogs so // de thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pas so //
analyzed: tshogs so // de thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pas so //
translated: are the collection of the words. Having heard that, they were amazed by way of the conventional truth.

original: rmad du gyur pa ni don dam pa'i bden pas so //
analyzed: rmad du gyur pa ni don dam pa'i bden pas so //
translated: They were astonished by way of the ultimate truth.

original: ae ma'o sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o //
translated: AHO! Buddha is the praise from the point of view of the conventional truth.

original: ae ma'o chos zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: ae ma'o chos zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: AHO! Dharma is from the point of view of the ultimate truth.

original: chos bshad pa ni ngo mtshar che //üîΩzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos bshad pa ni ngo mtshar che // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Dharma teaching is wondrous.

original: bden pa gnyis mi phyed pa'i rnam pa gsal bar byed pas chos ston par mdzad pa'i rnam pas bstod pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis mi phyed pa'i rnam pa gsal bar byed pas chos ston par mdzad pa'i rnam pas bstod pa'o //
translated: is the praise from the point of view of the teaching of the Dharma, which clarifies the aspect of the indivisibility of the two truths.

original: yang dag don ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag don ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The pure meaning is the clear light.

original: des dag pa'i don ni yongs su dag pa'i sku ste /
analyzed: des dag pa'i don ni yongs su dag pa'i sku ste /
translated: The meaning of pure is the pure body.

original: de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'chang chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //üîΩbdag med pa yi chos las byung //
analyzed: de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje 'chang chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o // bdag med pa yi chos las byung //
translated: I pay homage to you, Vajradhara, who possesses such special qualities of the enlightened mind.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Dharma of selflessness is the source.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa las yang dag par 'khrungs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa las yang dag par 'khrungs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is arises from the ultimate truth.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The enlightenment of the Buddha is the completion stage.üîΩ The Dharma of selflessness is the source.

original: des gdul bya rnams skyed par mdzad pas na ;
analyzed: des gdul bya rnams skyed par mdzad pas na ;
translated: Since it causes the development of those to be trained,

original: / sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: / sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
translated: it is the one who perfects the enlightenment of the buddhas.

original: rtog pa thams cad las 'das pas na rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad las 'das pas na rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: Since it transcends all conceptualization, it is non-conceptual.

original: de nyid kyis na dmigs su med pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na dmigs su med pa ste /
translated: And for that very reason, it is non-apprehensible,

original: dmigs pa dang bral ba khyed la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bral ba khyed la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
translated: to you who are free from apprehension, I pay homage.

original: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag du bzang pas na kun tu bzang po'o //
analyzed: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag du bzang pas na kun tu bzang po'o //
translated: To Samantabhadra and so forth: since it is good in both samsara and nirvana, it is Samantabhadra.

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na thams cad don no //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na thams cad don no //
translated: Since it is the essence of all perfections, it is the meaning of all.

original: lha'i dkyil 'khor spro bar mdzad pas na /
analyzed: lha'i dkyil 'khor spro bar mdzad pas na /
translated: Since it emanates the mandala of deities,

original: byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba'o //
translated: it is the one who fully turns the wheel of enlightenment.

original: byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Enlightenment is the ultimate truth.

original: de gang gis spyod cing thob par byed pa ni byang chub spyod pa ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: de gang gis spyod cing thob par byed pa ni byang chub spyod pa ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: That which practices and attains it is the practice of enlightenment, the conventional truth.

original: rdo rje che ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can te de lta bu ni khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje che ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can te de lta bu ni khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
translated: The great vajra is the nature of the two truths. I pay homage to you who are such.

original: sems kyi ngo bo nyid ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: sems kyi ngo bo nyid ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of mind?

original: dag pa zhes bya la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dag pa zhes bya la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said to be pure, etc.

original: dag pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste yongs su dag cing yid kyi rang bzhin gyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dag pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste yongs su dag cing yid kyi rang bzhin gyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Pure is ultimate truth, which is completely pure, and has the meaning of the nature body of mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid du gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid du gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: The Tathagata is the one who has gone to suchness, and thus is the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The Tathagata himself is the Tathagata.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: The holder of the vajra of body, speech, and mind.

original: zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni //
translated: This is said.

original: rdo rje gsum la sogs pa'i rnam par gdul bya rnams la snang bas so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum la sogs pa'i rnam par gdul bya rnams la snang bas so //
translated: Because of appearing to those to be tamed in the form of the three vajras, etc.

original: @26b sangs rgyas byang chub bar ston pa //
analyzed: @26b sangs rgyas byang chub bar ston pa //
translated: The teacher of the enlightenment of the buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is said.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par mdzad cing /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par mdzad cing /
translated: He is the one who causes the attainment of the enlightenment of the buddhas of vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la 'jog par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la 'jog par mdzad pas na /
translated: Since he causes one to be placed in the basic element of non-abiding nirvana,

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩzhes pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // zhes pa ste /
translated: Homage to you, who reveal the enlightenment of the buddhas!

original: sgra ji bzhin pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation according to the literal meaning.

original: byang chub kyi sems rab tu ston pas le'u ni byang chub sems kyi le'u'o sgrol ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rab tu ston pas le'u ni byang chub sems kyi le'u'o sgrol ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
translated: The chapter is the chapter on the thought of enlightenment because it teaches the thought of enlightenment.

original: le'u gnyis pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the second chapter, the chapter on the six parameters, in the commentary called TƒÅrƒÅ‚Äôs Clarification.

original: // / rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gnyis kyis phra mo bsgom pa rnam pa gsum bya'o zhes nye bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gnyis kyis phra mo bsgom pa rnam pa gsum bya'o zhes nye bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach that the two kinds of yogins should cultivate the three kinds of subtle yoga,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThen,‚Äù and so on.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThen‚Äù is to be connected with ‚Äúthe BhagavƒÅn spoke.‚Äù

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The TathƒÅgata of vajra body, speech, and mind is MahƒÅvajradhara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: All the Tathagatas are Akshobhya and so forth.

original: de rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir phyogs bcur khyab pa gang yin pa ni 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir phyogs bcur khyab pa gang yin pa ni 'phro ba'o //
translated: Their pervasion of the ten directions is their radiation for the sake of sentient beings.

original: de nyid ni chos kyi chu'i char 'bebs pas na sprin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni chos kyi chu'i char 'bebs pas na sprin no //
translated: They are clouds because they rain down the water of Dharma.

original: de nyid ni sems can bsam pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas phye bas sku du mar ston pa'i phyir bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni sems can bsam pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas phye bas sku du mar ston pa'i phyir bkod pa'o //
translated: They are arrays because they display many bodies, differentiated by the various aspirations of sentient beings.üîΩIt is a vajra because it is indivisible in that way.

original: de lta bu'i tshul gyis mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste ting nge 'dzin de la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshul gyis mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste ting nge 'dzin de la dmigs pa'o //
translated: It is a samadhi, and it is focused on that.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la bzhag pa'o //
translated: This is what is placed in the mind.

original: rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The vajra array is the array of the vajras, that is, the Tathagatas.

original: de'i bkod pa ni de rnam gyi tshogs gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de'i bkod pa ni de rnam gyi tshogs gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the array of their assemblies.

original: de ni rdo rje bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje bkod pa'o //
translated: That is the vajra array.

original: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzhi'i le'u ni ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste de gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzhi'i le'u ni ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste de gsungs pa'o //
translated: The chapter of the basis of that samadhi is the samadhi chapter, and it is taught.

original: de ltar le'u la zhugs nas lha rnams bskyed pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i gsang sngags dang por ston pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar le'u la zhugs nas lha rnams bskyed pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i gsang sngags dang por ston pa ni /
translated: Having thus entered the chapter, the first teaching of the secret mantra which is a limb of the generation of the deities is:

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Om, I am the nature of the vajra of the gnosis of emptiness.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par //
translated: In the middle of the realm of space

original: zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung ba la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung ba la gnas pa'o //
translated: means in the middle of the source of phenomena.üîΩThe mandala of the buddhas

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: and so forth refers to the mandala of the deities such as Vairochana.

original: 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che //
analyzed: 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che //
translated: The great array of clouds of light

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: rigs de dang der 'brel ba'i lha rnams te de rnams kyi tshogs ni sprin no //
analyzed: rigs de dang der 'brel ba'i lha rnams te de rnams kyi tshogs ni sprin no //
translated: the assembly of the deities connected with that and that family is a cloud.

original: de nyid gnas ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par gnas pas @27a * //
analyzed: de nyid gnas ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par gnas pas @27a * //
translated: Since they are perfectly situated in their own places,

original: na bkod pa chen po'o //
analyzed: na bkod pa chen po'o //
translated: they are the great array.

original: sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam //
translated: The light of the blazing buddhas

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi bdag po'i sku mdog dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi bdag po'i sku mdog dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: means they are the same color as their own lord.

original: 'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab //
analyzed: 'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab //
translated: pervaded by five-colored light.

original: ces bya ba ni kha dog sna lnga'i sa'i cha dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni kha dog sna lnga'i sa'i cha dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This means that it has parts of the five colors.

original: kun nas yongs su zlum por te //
analyzed: kun nas yongs su zlum por te //
translated: It is completely round.

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du bzang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du bzang ba'o //
translated: This means that it is good in every way.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab //
translated: It is pervaded by the five sense objects.

original: ces bya ba ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This means that it is endowed with the vajra of form and so forth.

original: mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa //
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa //
translated: It is adorned with the five offerings.

original: zhes bya ba ni /üîΩlha la sogs pa la nye bar bstan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / lha la sogs pa la nye bar bstan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang bcas pa'o //
translated: This means

original: mdor na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mdor na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: that it is endowed with the five offerings that are presented to the deities and so forth.

original: mdor bsdu na lha'i 'khor lo 'di ltar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdu na lha'i 'khor lo 'di ltar bsam par bya'o //
translated: In brief, one should imagine the wheel of the deities in this way.üîΩForm is in the center,

original: gzugs ni zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dbus su ste 'khor lo'i dkyil du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dbus su ste 'khor lo'i dkyil du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on oneself in the center of the wheel.

original: bdag por gyur pa nyid kyis gzhag go zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag por gyur pa nyid kyis gzhag go zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is placed by the one who is the lord, this is the meaning.

original: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po yang /
analyzed: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po yang /
translated: Then, the great seal of Vairocana and so forth,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs bzhin du dbus su bsgom par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs bzhin du dbus su bsgom par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that one should meditate on him in the center in the form of Great Vajradhara,

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, Vairochana, etc.

original: sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: He is marked with body, speech, and mind.üîΩThe great seal of Vairochana who resides near Vajradhara is the body vajra, but he also has the nature of Vairochana‚Äôs speech and mind, so he is

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang dang nye ba na bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ni sku rdo rje nyid du gyur pa yin yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsung dang thugs dag gi ngo bo nyid kyang mnga' bas sku gsung thugsüîΩkyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang dang nye ba na bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ni sku rdo rje nyid du gyur pa yin yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsung dang thugs dag gi ngo bo nyid kyang mnga' bas sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: marked with body, speech, and mind.

original: bsdus dang gcig tu sbyor pa yis //üîΩzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsdus dang gcig tu sbyor pa yis // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By gathering and uniting with one,

original: 'di la lha rnams kyi 'khor lo sdud pas na bsdus pa yis te rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di la lha rnams kyi 'khor lo sdud pas na bsdus pa yis te rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Here, he is ‚Äúgathered‚Äù by the deities, so he is the gathering, i.e., Great Vajradhara.

original: de dang gcig tu sbyor ba ni mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang gcig tu sbyor ba ni mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUniting with one‚Äù means that one should meditate on the great seal of Akshobhya.

original: de bzhin du dkon mchog dpal la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen por dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dkon mchog dpal la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen por dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Likewise, one should visualize the mandala in the center, with Ratnamati and so forth in the great seal.

original: rdo rje mchog ni gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mchog ni gang yin pa'o //

original: rin chen chen po ni @29a * //
analyzed: rin chen chen po ni @29a * //
translated: The great jewel

original: rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan te /
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan te /

original: rin che bas na rin po che'o //
analyzed: rin che bas na rin po che'o //

original: kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga las byung ba'o //
analyzed: kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga las byung ba'o //

original: de ni yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam sna yi rtse mor rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi nyin mtshan du rtag tu bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam sna yi rtse mor rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi nyin mtshan du rtag tu bsgom par bya'o //
translated: That [jewel] should be meditated upon constantly day and night at the tip of the nose, the size of a mustard seed, with the yoga of one's deity.

original: rin chen brtan par zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rin chen brtan par zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Beginning with the stable jewel,

original: gang gi tshe mthong ba'i mtshan ma nye bar skye ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mthong ba'i mtshan ma nye bar skye ba de'i tshe /

original: rdo rje la sogs pa bsgom pas mi 'gyur bar shes nas sgom pa la dbang du gyur pa skyed pa'i phyir spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs pa bsgom pas mi 'gyur bar shes nas sgom pa la dbang du gyur pa skyed pa'i phyir spro bar bya'o //

original: brtan par ma gyur yang mi spro //
analyzed: brtan par ma gyur yang mi spro //
translated: One should not emanate if one is not stable.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means

original: bsgom pa la slob bzhin par mi spro ba'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa la slob bzhin par mi spro ba'o //

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje la sogs pa la spro bas brtan par byas nas phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs kyang spro bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje la sogs pa la spro bas brtan par byas nas phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs kyang spro bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having made stable through the emanation of the vajra and so forth, one should emanate the form of the Great Seal.

original: sangs rgyas 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: To this end, he declares, ‚ÄúThe blazing buddhas,‚Äù and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas 'bar ba 'dra ba'i 'od ni dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'bar ba 'dra ba'i 'od ni dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The blazing buddhas are the light having the colors white and so forth.

original: mchog rab sprin rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi tshogs so //üîΩ'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchog rab sprin rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi tshogs so // 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The supreme clouds are the assemblies of buddhas.üîΩThe wheel, vajra, and jewel

analyzed: 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rin po ches nye bar mtshon pa'i sprin rnams kyis so //
translated: means the clouds characterized by the wheel, vajra, and jewel.

original: padma ral gri mtshon chen 'dzin //
analyzed: padma ral gri mtshon chen 'dzin //
translated: Holding a lotus and a great sword.

original: zhes bya ba ni padma dang ral gri bsnams pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma dang ral gri bsnams pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means holding a lotus and a sword.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams //
translated: The great clouds of Bodhisattvas

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: nye bar mtshon pas rigs lnga dang 'brel pa'i lha rnams kyang spro ba'i bdag nyid sgrub pa pos nam mkha' khyab par spro bar bya zhing g-yogs par bya'o zhes pa ste spyi'i don to //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pas rigs lnga dang 'brel pa'i lha rnams kyang spro ba'i bdag nyid sgrub pa pos nam mkha' khyab par spro bar bya zhing g-yogs par bya'o zhes pa ste spyi'i don to //
translated: that the practitioner, who is of the nature of emanation, should emanate and pervade the sky with the deities connected with the five families, as indicated by the above. This is the general meaning.

original: rin chen chen po ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems te yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam sna yi rtse mo ste /
analyzed: rin chen chen po ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems te yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam sna yi rtse mo ste /
translated: The great jewel is the relative awakening mind, the size of a mustard seed, at the tip of the nose.

original: rang gi rdo rje'i khar kha dog rnam pa lnga ste de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid du byas la rtag tu bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi rdo rje'i khar kha dog rnam pa lnga ste de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid du byas la rtag tu bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should visualize it as the nature of the five colors, the five transcendent ones, and always meditate on it.

original: rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro //
analyzed: rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro //
translated: When the jewel becomes stable, emanate it.üîΩThis means

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: that

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho gas rdo rje dang padma 'dus byas pa sngon du 'gro bas /üîΩrang gi sems kyi rin po che brtan par byas nas rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho gas rdo rje dang padma 'dus byas pa sngon du 'gro bas / rang gi sems kyi rin po che brtan par byas nas rnal 'byor te /

analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pas spro bar bya zhing dbyung bar bya'o // sangs rgyas 'bar ba 'dra ba'i 'od //

original: ces bya ba la sogs pas ni byang chub kyi sems phyung ba las bu dang tsha bo la sogs pa'i tshul du phyung ba'i @29b dkyil 'khor du ston pa yin te sbas pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pas ni byang chub kyi sems phyung ba las bu dang tsha bo la sogs pa'i tshul du phyung ba'i @29b dkyil 'khor du ston pa yin te sbas pa'o //
translated: The line the blazing Buddha, light-like and so forth shows the mandala that is emitted from the emitted bodhicitta in the manner of sons, grandsons, and so forth.

original: kha dog rnam pa lnga pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can rin po che ni mi shigs par grags pa ste /
analyzed: kha dog rnam pa lnga pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can rin po che ni mi shigs par grags pa ste /
translated: The line the jewel, known as indestructible refers to the jewel that is the nature of the five-colored TathƒÅgata.

original: sangs rgyas rin po che skyed pas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin po che skyed pas so //
translated: The line the jewel of the Buddha refers to the production of the jewel of the Buddha.

original: yungs kar gyi 'bru tshad tsam zhes bya ba ni thig le'i gzugs can yin pas so //
analyzed: yungs kar gyi 'bru tshad tsam zhes bya ba ni thig le'i gzugs can yin pas so //

analyzed: sna'i rtse mor zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i padma'i lte bar ro //
translated: The line at the tip of the nose refers to the center of the heart lotus.

original: nan tan du zhes pa ni de la zhan pas 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang ba dang / sdud pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rtag par nyin mtshan du bsgom por bya'o //
analyzed: nan tan du zhes pa ni de la zhan pas 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang ba dang / sdud pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rtag par nyin mtshan du bsgom por bya'o //
translated: The phrase with effort means that one should meditate constantly, day and night, with the yoga of entering, abiding, rising, and gathering, without being weak in that.

original: brtan pa ni rtag pa ste /
analyzed: brtan pa ni rtag pa ste /
translated: Firm means constant.

original: de gang zhe na mi shigs pa'o //
analyzed: de gang zhe na mi shigs pa'o //
translated: What is that? It is the indestructible.

original: de las rin chen te kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs spro bar bya zhing /
analyzed: de las rin chen te kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs spro bar bya zhing /

original: 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang bas 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / ldang bas 'jug par bya'o //

original: brtan par ma gyur zhes bya ba ni mi shigs pa'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di'i bya'i gzhan gnyis ni ma yin no zhes ba stan pa yin no //üîΩda ni spro ba'i chog bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: brtan par ma gyur zhes bya ba ni mi shigs pa'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di'i bya'i gzhan gnyis ni ma yin no zhes ba stan pa yin no // da ni spro ba'i chog bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Not firm means that this yoga of realizing the reality of the indestructible is the only one, not the other two, as has been taught.

original: sangs rgyas 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the rite of emanation, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, blazing buddhas, etc.

analyzed: sangs rgyas 'bar ba ni 'od zer rnam pa lnga'o //

original: de dang 'dra ba'i 'od ni dkyil 'khor bzhi ste /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i 'od ni dkyil 'khor bzhi ste /

original: g-yas pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas /
analyzed: g-yas pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas /
translated: By the division of the right and so forth,üîΩone should fill the realm of space

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin spros pas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin spros pas //
translated: with the emanation of clouds of Tathagatas.

original: nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa dgong bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa dgong bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste mthar thug pa'o //

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩnam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
translated: In order to teach the creation stage of Vairochana and so forth,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúIn the center of the realm of space,‚Äù and so forth.

analyzed: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
translated: Having previously visualized the moon ma·πá·∏çala through focusing on suchness,

original: de'i steng du 'khor lo bsams te de yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: de'i steng du 'khor lo bsams te de yongs su gyur pa las /
translated: one should visualize the wheel above it, and through its transformation,

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo //

original: de bzhin du padma yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: de bzhin du padma yongs su gyur pa las /
translated: Similarly, through the transformation of the lotus,

analyzed: padma'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba padma r'a ga'i 'od can 'od dpag tu med pa padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor bas bsgom par bya'o //

original: rin po che la brtson pa rin po che'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba kha dog ser por bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che la brtson pa rin po che'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba kha dog ser por bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The yogin of the family of the jewel, who is diligent in the jewel, should meditate on the mandala of Ratnasa·πÉbhava, which is like a jewel, and is yellow in color.

analyzed: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sna tshogs rdo rje ste de las byung ba'i don @30a* // yod par gyur pa bsgoms par bya'o //
translated: The mandala of application is the vajra cross, and the meaning that arises from that is the meaning of the jewel.üîΩThe meaning of the jewel is the meaning of the jewel, which is the meaning of the jewel.

original: nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya //
analyzed: nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ni nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa ste nam mkha' dang 'dra ba der gnas pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúLike space‚Äù means like space, and ‚Äúequal‚Äù means equal to space.

analyzed: nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs sgrub pas mtshon pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor te /

original: de gang zhe na mi bskyod pa ste de rdo rje las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de gang zhe na mi bskyod pa ste de rdo rje las byung ba'o //
translated: What is that? It is Ak·π£obhya, who arises from the vajra.üîΩThese are the supreme buddhas,

analyzed: 'di dag sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog / thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o //

analyzed: de sems can rnams kyis dmigs shing 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de'o // rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: That is the nature of the observation and retention of sentient beings.üîΩThe chapter called ‚ÄúVajra Array‚Äù is the vajra of the TathƒÅgatas.

analyzed: de rnams kyis bkod pa ni gang du 'dus pa mdzad pa de ni rdo rje bkod pa le'u zhes bya ba ste drang ba'o don to //
translated: The array is where they gather. That is the ‚ÄúVajra Array Chapter.‚Äù

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The realm of space is clear light.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te mi shigs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te mi shigs pa'o //
translated: In the middle of that is the moon disk, which is the indestructible.

original: bri bar bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bri bar bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //

original: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //

analyzed: zhes pa ni mi shigs pa las nges par byung ba'o //
translated: is the moon disk, which is the indestructible.

original: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni chu'i dkyil 'khor te mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kha dog dkar zhing dal bar rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni chu'i dkyil 'khor te mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kha dog dkar zhing dal bar rgyu ba'o //
translated: The wheel disk is the water disk, which is the nature of Ak·π£obhya, white in color and slow moving.

analyzed: de sgom pa ni 'byung bar gyur par shes par bya'o //

original: padma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni //
analyzed: padma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni //
translated: The lotus mandala is

original: me'i dkyil 'khor te kha dog dmar po'o //
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor te kha dog dmar po'o //
translated: the fire mandala, which is red.

original: padma bsgom par bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid de g-yas nas byung bar gyur par shes par bya'o //üîΩrin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra ni //

translated: One should know that the meditation on the lotus, which is the nature of AmitƒÅbha, arises from the right.üîΩThe jewel mandala is

original: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: the earth mandala.

original: rin chen brtson zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan zlos pas gnyi ga las byung bar gyur par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen brtson zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan zlos pas gnyi ga las byung bar gyur par shes par bya'o //
translated: The jewel striving is Ratnasambhava. The reciter should know that both arise from the left.

original: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The mandala of union is the wind mandala,

analyzed: kha dog nag po don yod par grub pa'i ngo go nyid g-yon nas byung bar yin par shes par bya ste /

analyzed: de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid 'od zer bzhi'i rab tu rgyu ba bshad pa yin no //

analyzed: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs sgrub cing sku la sogs pa skyed pas na rdo rje las byung ba ste /

analyzed: 'od gsal ba las bzhengs pa @30b bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi lha'i dkyil 'khor yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the ma·πá·∏çala of deities, which is the nature of the two truths, arises from clear light.

original: gang gi zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi zhe na /
translated: Whose?

analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob par 'dod pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Those who have attained the state of omniscience are those who desire to attain the state of omniscience.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the vajra, etc.,

analyzed: rdo rje ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha'i sku'o //
translated: the vajra is the complete body of the deity.

original: bkod pa ni tshogs so //
analyzed: bkod pa ni tshogs so //

original: de ston pa'i tshig gi le'u la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston pa'i tshig gi le'u la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The chapter that teaches that is called that.
